text: This will allow us to identify and address potential issues before they significantly impact our ability to reach our audience .
us to identify and address potential issues before they significantly impact our ability to reach our audience
address potential issues before they significantly impact our ability to reach our audience
before they significantly impact our ability to reach our audience
to reach our audience
The monitoring system must integrate with both the Mailgun API and Gmail Postmaster .
Integration with the Mailgun API will provide valuable data on our sending reputation as perceived by our email service provider .
as perceived by our email service provider
This will likely include metrics related to bounce rates , spam complaints , and overall account health .
related to bounce rates
integrating with Gmail Postmaster

Simultaneously , integrating with Gmail Postmaster will offer direct insights into how Gmail , a major recipient domain , views our sending reputation and the deliverability of our emails to their users .
how Gmail , a major recipient domain , views our sending reputation and the deliverability of our emails to their users
The definition of a " point " drop will need to be aligned with the specific metrics provided by the Mailgun API and Gmail Postmaster .
to be aligned with the specific metrics provided by the Mailgun API and Gmail Postmaster
provided by the Mailgun API and Gmail Postmaster
Understanding the typical range and variability of reputation scores from both platforms
avoid excessive or insufficient notifications.4
Dashboard Widget for Reputation Trends : A dedicated dashboard widget is required to visually represent the historical trends of our email sending reputation .
to visually represent the historical trends of our email sending reputation

This widget should display reputation scores over time , allowing us to easily identify patterns , track improvements resulting from any remediation efforts , and proactively detect potential long - term issues .
allowing us to easily identify patterns , track improvements resulting from any remediation efforts , and proactively detect potential long - term issues
us to easily identify patterns , track improvements resulting from any remediation efforts , and proactively detect potential long - term issues
resulting from any remediation efforts
proactively detect potential long - term issues
To enable this visualization
To enable this visualization , the system will need to store and aggregate the reputation data collected from the Mailgun API and Gmail Postmaster on an ongoing basis .
to store and aggregate the reputation data collected from the Mailgun API and Gmail Postmaster on an ongoing basis
aggregate the reputation data collected from the Mailgun API and Gmail Postmaster on an ongoing basis
collected from the Mailgun API and Gmail Postmaster on an ongoing basis
